医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究：许多患有轻度认知障碍的老年人仍在开车德克萨斯州南部社区的一项密歇根医学研究发现，尽管护理人员和其他人提出了担忧，但大多数患有认知障碍的老年人仍在开车。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Study-Many-older-adults-with-mild-cognitive-impairment-are-still-driven.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Study-Many-older-adults-with-mild-cognitive-impairment-are-still-driven.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f955429-8b50-4377-bf71-c2690226f6ae Thu, 20 Jul 2023 09:31:29 -0400 Study: Many older adults with mild cognitive impairment are still driving
研究揭示无症状 SARS-CoV-2 感染的遗传基础感染了 COVID-19 但从未出现症状的人（即所谓的超级躲闪者）可能拥有遗传王牌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Study-reveals-a-genic-basis-for-asymptomatic-SARS-CoV-2-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Study-reveals-a-genic-basis-for-asymptomatic-SARS-CoV-2-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2d16bda-dede-4253-8b24-89a122d67e71 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 09:23:03 -0400 Study reveals a genetic basis for asymptomatic SARS-CoV-2 infection
科学家敦促在少数族裔人群的医疗保健中使用人工智能模型之前要谨慎科学家们敦促在将 ChatGPT 等人工智能 (AI) 模型用于少数族裔人群的医疗保健之前保持谨慎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Scientists-urge-caution-before-using-AI-models-in-healthcare-for-ethnic-minority-populations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Scientists-urge-caution-before-using-AI-models-in-healthcare-for-ethnic-minority-populations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b280de40-ea09-4476-8a60-dad633e73201 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 09:18:01 -0400 Scientists urge caution before using AI models in healthcare for ethnic minority populations
基于汗液的可穿戴技术作为代谢综合征患者的潜在监测工具基于汗液的可穿戴设备监测代谢综合征的机遇和挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Sweat-based-wearable-technologies-as-a-pottial-monitoring-tool-for-病人-with-metabolic-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Sweat-based-wearable-technologies-as-a-pottial-monitoring-tool-for-病人-with-metabolic-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74a593b5-6ddb-4353-a800-a55fc1af9cc7 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 08:50:00 -0400 Sweat-based wearable technologies as a potential monitoring tool for patients with metabolic syndrome
睡眠结构和呼吸相关睡眠障碍的哪些方面与中老年人的认知功能相关？在最近的一项研究中，研究人员创建了睡眠与痴呆症联盟，其中包括五项基于人群的队列研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Which-aspects-of-sleep-architecture-and-respiratory-lated-sleep-disturbances-are-linked-with-cognitive-function-in-middle-ged-to-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Which-aspects-of-sleep-architecture-and-respiratory-lated-sleep-disturbances-are-linked-with-cognitive-function-in-middle-ged-to-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f03e7da0-0a57-4641-9534-1c0b015ac67d Thu, 20 Jul 2023 08:30:00 -0400 Which aspects of sleep architecture and respiratory-related sleep disturbances are associated with cognitive function in middle-aged to older adults?
机器学习模型可以预测少数族裔女性怀孕早期的抑郁症吗？研究人员建立并评估了机器学习模型，以利用电子病历数据预测孕妇的抑郁症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Could-Machine-Learning-models-serve-to-predict-depression-in-early-pregnancy-in-racialethnic-minority-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Could-Machine-Learning-models-serve-to-predict-depression-in-early-pregnancy-in-racialethnic-minority-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e729726-d202-4ddb-afe4-53c69024933d Thu, 20 Jul 2023 08:26:00 -0400 Could Machine Learning models serve to predict depression in early pregnancy in racial/ethnic minority women?
了解持续的 COVID-19 症状：研究探索长期 COVID 的早期指标研究人员对在 COVID-19 急性期期间集中采样的个体进行了 SARS-CoV-2 感染急性后后遗症的早期生物标志物的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Understanding-persistent-COVID-19-symptoms-study-explores-early-indicators-of-long-COVID.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Understanding-persistent-COVID-19-symptoms-study-explores-early-indicators-of-long-COVID.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7883bc7d-229c-41f6-aba4-7be9c45db82a Thu, 20 Jul 2023 08:13:00 -0400 Understanding persistent COVID-19 symptoms: study explores early indicators of long COVID
新型脑渗透激动剂有望保护多巴胺神经元以治疗帕金森病研究人员报告称 Nurr1 是治疗帕金森病 (PD) 的一个有前景的治疗靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/New-brain-penetrant-agonist-shows-promise-in-protecting-dopamine-neurons-for-Parkinsons-disease-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/New-brain-penetrant-agonist-shows-promise-in-protecting-dopamine-neurons-for-Parkinsons-disease-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35e47181-d77c-402c-9f48-aa03cfb9753d Thu, 20 Jul 2023 07:59:00 -0400 New brain-penetrant agonist shows promise in protecting dopamine neurons for Parkinson's disease treatment
Donanemab：阿尔茨海默病治疗的开拓者？最近的一项研究评估了 donanemab 的功效和副作用，这种抗体可能会清除早期症状性阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 的大脑淀粉样斑块。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Donanemab-A-trailblazer-for-Alzheimers-disease-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Donanemab-A-trailblazer-for-Alzheimers-disease-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08b7b20d-9fe6-40d9-942f-03e50122f76c Thu, 20 Jul 2023 06:55:00 -0400 Donanemab: A trailblazer for Alzheimer's disease treatment?
值得深思：地中海 DASH 干预对大脑健康有积极影响研究人员调查了坚持地中海饮食方法之间的纵向关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Food-for-thought-Mediterranean-DASH-intervention-shows-positive-impact-on-brain-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Food-for-thought-Mediterranean-DASH-intervention-shows-positive-impact-on-brain-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a0e1790-411b-4a07-9032-e012eb670117 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 06:54:00 -0400 Food for thought: Mediterranean-DASH intervention shows positive impact on brain health
